ing: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed
des: "A simple, tasty salad you can make anytime.  Colorful and tasty!  You can use green peppers instead of the red, if you prefer."
ins: In a large bowl, mix together mayonnaise, salt, pepper, red (or green) pepper, celery and pickles until combined.  Stir in peas and cheese.  Chill until ready to serve.  Serve over lettuce leaves.
